Class ReviewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mms.controller.AbstractController
      • mms.controller.ReviewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ReviewController
extends AbstractController
implements IReviewController
    Controller for the review view.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
